name: @lacussoft/cpf-fmt
description: Basic function to validate CPF (Brazilian ID document).
author: Julio L. Muller

scripts.build: npm run build:dist && npm run build:node
scripts.build:dist: parcel build src/dist.js -o cpf-fmt.js --no-minify && parcel build src/dist.js -o cpf-fmt.min.js
scripts.build:node: parcel build src/core/cpfFmt.ts  -d src/ -o index.js --no-source-maps --no-minify --target node
